titleStmt.title: Laban T. Moore to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG12019

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

msIdentifier.collection: 37th - 76th Regiments Enrolled Militia Primary Source Documents (1861-1866)
msIdentifier.idno: Box 81, Folder 68th Regiment 1863-1866 Commissions and Oaths

body.p:
Catlettsburg Ky
Oct 246th 1863.
Gov Bramlett
Sir

Captain Thomas McKinster of Lawrence County desires to be commissioned to organize the Malitia of this County, I think he will make an efficient officer, if it is given aim please corespind with him at Louisa Lawrence County Ky --

I am your obedient Svnt
Laban T Moore

Thomas. McKinster Colonel 62 Infy Regt
Novr 5. 1863.
1. 2. 3. 4.
Issue Commission & send copy of law and file of orders

Lawrence Coy
Col. Thos McKinster
(68 Regt)
Com issd & forwd
Novr 5. 1863
